programme.title: HK Best Of's - Best of Submissions Fall 2015 - Episode 1 NEW
KARATE COMBAT: GENESIS - Randy Cura vs. Alexandre Bouderbane
programme.sub-title: KARATE COMBAT: GENESIS - Randy Cura vs. Alexandre Bouderbane
programme.desc: A private pre-season event held in a secret warehouse in Budapest, Hungary, the inaugural Karate Combat: Genesis event took place on February 3, 2018. The event showcases the incredible depth of the fight roster highlighting many karate legends in various weight classes, competing for the first time ever in this new sporting league.

programme.title: KARATE COMBAT: ONE WORLD - Abdalla Ibrahim vs. Dionicio Gustavo
programme.sub-title: KARATE COMBAT: ONE WORLD - Abdalla Ibrahim vs. Dionicio Gustavo
programme.desc: Live from New York City, NY on Sept. 27, 2018, Karate Combat: One World is the third event of the Karate Combat fighting league's inaugural season. Heldatop the Freedom Tower on the 102nd Floor Observation Deck of One World Trade Center building. On the Main Card: Abdalla Ibrahim of the US/Egypt vs.Dionicio Gustavo of Dominican Republic. The co-main event features Brazil’s Luis Rocha and Dimitris Triantafyllis of Greece. A stacked card of 9 fights also featuresElhadji Ndour, Josh Quayhagen, and newcomers Adilet Shadykanov and Edgars Skrivers.

programme.title: Ultimate Warrior Challenge - Episode 02
programme.sub-title: Ultimate Warrior Challenge - Episode 02
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europe's leading MMA shows, since it's inception in 2006 it's has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage. UFC stars such as Simeon Thoreson, Luke 'Bigslow' Barnatt, RiccoRodriguez,Thierry "The African Assassin" Sokoudjou, Phil De Fries, Paul Kelly to name but a few, have graced the UWC cage. UWC continues to grow and to bring the fight fans across Europe the fights they want to see.
